compatibility.notes: MPL-1.0 allows for linking with proprietary code under certain conditions, but care must be taken with GPL licenses due to their strong copyleft nature.

key_requirements: Provide access to the source code when distributing the executable version.
Include the original copyright notice and license in all copies or substantial portions of the Covered Code.
State any modifications made to the original code.
license.name: MPL-1.0
obligations: If you distribute the Covered Code, you must make the source code available under the same license.
You must include a copy of the MPL license with any distribution of the Covered Code.
You must include a notice stating any changes made to the original code.
